item1:
交货单数据的查询
Inquiry of delivery order data
item2:
可查询所有交货单数据
Query all delivery order data
item4:
SAP下传相关交货单数据
SAP download related delivery order data
item5:
Delivery No、收货者、收货者名称；或挑选指定的Delivery No
Delivery no, ship-to party, ship-to name; or pick a specific delivery no
输出
item6:
交货单数据
delivery order data
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的交货单数据，系统将提示查无此交货单信息
If there is no eligible delivery order data, the system will prompt to find no such delivery information
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选Delivery No后点选Query查询交货单数据
Enter query conditions or select delivery No. and click Query to query delivery order data
2. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
3. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
后置条件
